001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.checkbox;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.Insertion;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.strategy.Strategy;
006import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil;
007import java.util.List;
008import org.openqa.selenium.By;
009
010import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config.UiConfigHolder.getUiConfig;
011
012/**
013 * Provides service-level methods for interacting with checkbox UI components.
014 *
015 * <p>This interface defines operations to select, deselect, and verify the state
016 * of checkboxes, delegating the actual interactions to specific implementations
017 * based on the configured {@link CheckboxComponentType}.
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021public interface CheckboxService extends Insertion {
022
023   CheckboxComponentType DEFAULT_TYPE = getDefaultType();
024
025   /**
026    * Retrieves the default checkbox component type from the configuration.
027    *
028    * @return The default CheckboxComponentType.
029    */
030   private static CheckboxComponentType getDefaultType() {
031      try {
032         return ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(CheckboxComponentType.class,
033               getUiConfig().checkboxDefaultType(),
034               getUiConfig().projectPackages());
035      } catch (Exception ignored) {
036         return null;
037      }
038   }
039
040   /**
041    * Selects checkboxes with their specified text inside a container, using the default checkbox component type.
042    *
043    * @param container    The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
044    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkbox to click.
045    */
046   default void select(SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText) {
047      select(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, checkBoxText);
048   }
049
050   /**
051    * Selects checkboxes with the specified text inside a container, using the given checkbox component type.
052    *
053    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
054    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkbox.
055    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkbox to click.
056    */
057   void select(CheckboxComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText);
058
059   /**
060    * Selects checkboxes inside a container based on a specified strategy, using the default checkbox component type.
061    *
062    * @param container The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
063    * @param strategy  The strategy to determine which checkboxes to select.
064    * @return A string indicating the result of the selection process.
065    */
066   default String select(SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy) {
067      return select(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, strategy);
068   }
069
070   /**
071    * Selects checkboxes inside a container based on a specified strategy, using the given checkbox component type.
072    *
073    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
074    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
075    * @param strategy      The strategy to determine which checkboxes to select.
076    * @return A string indicating the result of the selection process.
077    */
078   String select(CheckboxComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy);
079
080   /**
081    * Selects checkboxes with the specified text using the default checkbox component type.
082    *
083    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkboxes to select.
084    */
085   default void select(String... checkBoxText) {
086      select(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxText);
087   }
088
089   /**
090    * Selects checkboxes with the specified text using the given checkbox component type.
091    *
092    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
093    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkboxes to select.
094    */
095   void select(CheckboxComponentType componentType, String... checkBoxText);
096
097   /**
098    * Selects checkboxes identified by specified locators, using the default checkbox component type.
099    *
100    * @param checkBoxLocator The locators for the checkboxes to select.
101    */
102   default void select(By... checkBoxLocator) {
103      select(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxLocator);
104   }
105
106   /**
107    * Selects checkboxes identified by specified locators, using the given checkbox component type.
108    *
109    * @param componentType   The specific checkbox component type.
110    * @param checkBoxLocator The locators for the checkboxes to select.
111    */
112   void select(CheckboxComponentType componentType, By... checkBoxLocator);
113
114   /**
115    * Deselects checkboxes with their specified text inside a container, using the default checkbox component type.
116    *
117    * @param container    The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
118    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkbox to click.
119    */
120   default void deSelect(SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText) {
121      deSelect(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, checkBoxText);
122   }
123
124   /**
125    * Deselects checkboxes with the specified text inside a container, using the given checkbox component type.
126    *
127    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
128    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkbox.
129    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkbox to click.
130    */
131   void deSelect(CheckboxComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText);
132
133   /**
134    * Deselects checkboxes inside a container based on a specified strategy, using the default checkbox component type.
135    *
136    * @param container The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
137    * @param strategy  The strategy to determine which checkboxes to deselect.
138    * @return A string indicating the result of the deselection process.
139    */
140   default String deSelect(SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy) {
141      return deSelect(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, strategy);
142   }
143
144   /**
145    * Deselects checkboxes inside a container based on a specified strategy, using the given checkbox component type.
146    *
147    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
148    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
149    * @param strategy      The strategy to determine which checkboxes to deselect.
150    * @return A string indicating the result of the deselection process.
151    */
152   String deSelect(CheckboxComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy);
153
154   /**
155    * Deselects checkboxes with the specified text using the default checkbox component type.
156    *
157    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkboxes to deselect.
158    */
159   default void deSelect(String... checkBoxText) {
160      deSelect(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxText);
161   }
162
163   /**
164    * Deselects checkboxes with the specified text using the given checkbox component type.
165    *
166    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
167    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkboxes to deselect.
168    */
169   void deSelect(CheckboxComponentType componentType, String... checkBoxText);
170
171   /**
172    * Deselects checkboxes identified by specified locators, using the default checkbox component type.
173    *
174    * @param checkBoxLocator The locators for the checkboxes to deselect.
175    */
176   default void deSelect(By... checkBoxLocator) {
177      deSelect(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxLocator);
178   }
179
180   /**
181    * Deselects checkboxes identified by specified locators, using the given checkbox component type.
182    *
183    * @param componentType   The specific checkbox component type.
184    * @param checkBoxLocator The locators for the checkboxes to deselect.
185    */
186   void deSelect(CheckboxComponentType componentType, By... checkBoxLocator);
187
188   /**
189    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text inside a container are selected, using the default checkbox
190    * component type.
191    *
192    * @param container    The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
193    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkboxes to verify.
194    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected, false otherwise.
195    */
196   default boolean areSelected(SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText) {
197      return areSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, checkBoxText);
198   }
199
200   /**
201    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text inside a container are selected, using the given checkbox
202    * component type.
203    *
204    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
205    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
206    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkboxes to verify.
207    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected, false otherwise.
208    */
209   boolean areSelected(CheckboxComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText);
210
211   /**
212    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text are selected, using the default checkbox component type.
213    *
214    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkboxes to verify.
215    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected, false otherwise.
216    */
217   default boolean areSelected(String... checkBoxText) {
218      return areSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxText);
219   }
220
221   /**
222    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text are selected, using the given checkbox component type.
223    *
224    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
225    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkboxes to verify.
226    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected, false otherwise.
227    */
228   boolean areSelected(CheckboxComponentType componentType, String... checkBoxText);
229
230   /**
231    * Checks if the checkboxes identified by the specified locators are selected, using the default checkbox
232    * component type.
233    *
234    * @param checkBoxLocator The locators for the checkboxes to verify.
235    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected, false otherwise.
236    */
237   default boolean areSelected(By... checkBoxLocator) {
238      return areSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxLocator);
239   }
240
241   /**
242    * Checks if the checkboxes identified by the specified locators are selected, using the given checkbox
243    * component type.
244    *
245    * @param componentType   The specific checkbox component type.
246    * @param checkBoxLocator The locators for the checkboxes to verify.
247    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected, false otherwise.
248    */
249   boolean areSelected(CheckboxComponentType componentType, By... checkBoxLocator);
250
251   /**
252    * Checks if the checkbox with the specified text inside a container is selected, using the default checkbox
253    * component type.
254    *
255    * @param container    The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkbox.
256    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkbox to verify.
257    * @return true if the checkbox is selected, false otherwise.
258    */
259   default boolean isSelected(SmartWebElement container, String checkBoxText) {
260      return areSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, checkBoxText);
261   }
262
263   /**
264    * Checks if the checkbox with the specified text inside a container is selected, using the given checkbox
265    * component type.
266    *
267    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
268    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkbox.
269    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkbox to verify.
270    * @return true if the checkbox is selected, false otherwise.
271    */
272   boolean isSelected(CheckboxComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String checkBoxText);
273
274   /**
275    * Checks if the checkbox with the specified text is selected, using the default checkbox component type.
276    *
277    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkbox to verify.
278    * @return true if the checkbox is selected, false otherwise.
279    */
280   default boolean isSelected(String checkBoxText) {
281      return areSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxText);
282   }
283
284   /**
285    * Checks if the checkbox with the specified text is selected, using the given checkbox component type.
286    *
287    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
288    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkbox to verify.
289    * @return true if the checkbox is selected, false otherwise.
290    */
291   boolean isSelected(CheckboxComponentType componentType, String checkBoxText);
292
293   /**
294    * Checks if the checkbox identified by the specified locator is selected, using the default checkbox component type.
295    *
296    * @param checkBoxLocator The locator for the checkbox to verify.
297    * @return true if the checkbox is selected, false otherwise.
298    */
299   default boolean isSelected(By checkBoxLocator) {
300      return areSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxLocator);
301   }
302
303   /**
304    * Checks if the checkbox identified by the specified locator is selected, using the given checkbox component type.
305    *
306    * @param componentType   The specific checkbox component type.
307    * @param checkBoxLocator The locator for the checkbox to verify.
308    * @return true if the checkbox is selected, false otherwise.
309    */
310   boolean isSelected(CheckboxComponentType componentType, By checkBoxLocator);
311
312   /**
313    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text inside a container are enabled, using the default checkbox
314    * component type.
315    *
316    * @param container    The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
317    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkboxes to verify.
318    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled, false otherwise.
319    */
320   default boolean areEnabled(SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText) {
321      return areEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, checkBoxText);
322   }
323
324   /**
325    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text inside a container are enabled, using the given checkbox
326    * component type.
327    *
328    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
329    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
330    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkboxes to verify.
331    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled, false otherwise.
332    */
333   boolean areEnabled(CheckboxComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText);
334
335   /**
336    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text are enabled, using the default checkbox component type.
337    *
338    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkboxes to verify.
339    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled, false otherwise.
340    */
341   default boolean areEnabled(String... checkBoxText) {
342      return areEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxText);
343   }
344
345   /**
346    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text are enabled, using the given checkbox component type.
347    *
348    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
349    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkboxes to verify.
350    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled, false otherwise.
351    */
352   boolean areEnabled(CheckboxComponentType componentType, String... checkBoxText);
353
354   /**
355    * Checks if the checkboxes identified by the specified locators are enabled, using the default checkbox
356    * component type.
357    *
358    * @param checkBoxLocator The locators for the checkboxes to verify.
359    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled, false otherwise.
360    */
361   default boolean areEnabled(By... checkBoxLocator) {
362      return areEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxLocator);
363   }
364
365   /**
366    * Checks if the checkboxes identified by the specified locators are enabled, using the given checkbox
367    * component type.
368    *
369    * @param componentType   The specific checkbox component type.
370    * @param checkBoxLocator The locators for the checkboxes to verify.
371    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled, false otherwise.
372    */
373   boolean areEnabled(CheckboxComponentType componentType, By... checkBoxLocator);
374
375   /**
376    * Checks if the checkbox with the specified text inside a container is enabled, using the default checkbox
377    * component type.
378    *
379    * @param container    The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkbox.
380    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkbox to verify.
381    * @return true if the checkbox is enabled, false otherwise.
382    */
383   default boolean isEnabled(SmartWebElement container, String checkBoxText) {
384      return areEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, checkBoxText);
385   }
386
387   /**
388    * Checks if the checkbox with the specified text inside a container is enabled, using the given checkbox
389    * component type.
390    *
391    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
392    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkbox.
393    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkbox to verify.
394    * @return true if the checkbox is enabled, false otherwise.
395    */
396   boolean isEnabled(CheckboxComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String checkBoxText);
397
398   /**
399    * Checks if the checkbox with the specified text is enabled, using the default checkbox component type.
400    *
401    * @param checkBoxText The text of the checkbox to verify.
402    * @return true if the checkbox is enabled, false otherwise.
403    */
404   default boolean isEnabled(String checkBoxText) {
405      return areEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxText);
406   }
407
408   /**
409    * Checks if the checkbox with the specified text is enabled, using the given checkbox component type.
410    *
411    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
412    * @param checkBoxText  The text of the checkbox to verify.
413    * @return true if the checkbox is enabled, false otherwise.
414    */
415   boolean isEnabled(CheckboxComponentType componentType, String checkBoxText);
416
417   /**
418    * Checks if the checkbox identified by the specified locator is enabled, using the default checkbox component type.
419    *
420    * @param checkBoxLocator The locator for the checkbox to verify.
421    * @return true if the checkbox is enabled, false otherwise.
422    */
423   default boolean isEnabled(By checkBoxLocator) {
424      return areEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, checkBoxLocator);
425   }
426
427   /**
428    * Checks if the checkbox identified by the specified locator is enabled, using the given checkbox component type.
429    *
430    * @param componentType   The specific checkbox component type.
431    * @param checkBoxLocator The locator for the checkbox to verify.
432    * @return true if the checkbox is enabled, false otherwise.
433    */
434   boolean isEnabled(CheckboxComponentType componentType, By checkBoxLocator);
435
436   /**
437    * Retrieves the text of all selected checkboxes inside a container, using the default checkbox component type.
438    *
439    * @param container The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
440    * @return A list of strings representing the text of all selected checkboxes.
441    */
442   default List<String> getSelected(SmartWebElement container) {
443      return getSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, container);
444   }
445
446   /**
447    * Retrieves the text of all selected checkboxes inside a container, using the given checkbox component type.
448    *
449    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
450    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
451    * @return A list of strings representing the text of all selected checkboxes.
452    */
453   List<String> getSelected(CheckboxComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container);
454
455   /**
456    * Retrieves the text of all selected checkboxes inside a container identified by the specified locator, using the
457    * default checkbox component type.
458    *
459    * @param containerLocator The locator for the container that contains the checkboxes.
460    * @return A list of strings representing the text of all selected checkboxes.
461    */
462   default List<String> getSelected(By containerLocator) {
463      return getSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, containerLocator);
464   }
465
466   /**
467    * Retrieves the text of all selected checkboxes inside a container identified by the specified locator, using the
468    * given checkbox component type.
469    *
470    * @param componentType    The specific checkbox component type.
471    * @param containerLocator The locator for the container that contains the checkboxes.
472    * @return A list of strings representing the text of all selected checkboxes.
473    */
474   List<String> getSelected(CheckboxComponentType componentType, By containerLocator);
475
476   /**
477    * Retrieves the text of all checkboxes inside a container, regardless of their state, using the default checkbox
478    * component type.
479    *
480    * @param container The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
481    * @return A list of strings representing the text of all checkboxes.
482    */
483   default List<String> getAll(SmartWebElement container) {
484      return getAll(DEFAULT_TYPE, container);
485   }
486
487   /**
488    * Retrieves the text of all checkboxes inside a container, regardless of their state, using the given checkbox
489    * component type.
490    *
491    * @param componentType The specific checkbox component type.
492    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container that contains the checkboxes.
493    * @return A list of strings representing the text of all checkboxes.
494    */
495   List<String> getAll(CheckboxComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container);
496
497   /**
498    * Retrieves the text of all checkboxes inside a container identified by the specified locator, regardless of their
499    * state, using the default checkbox component type.
500    *
501    * @param containerLocator The locator for the container that contains the checkboxes.
502    * @return A list of strings representing the text of all checkboxes.
503    */
504   default List<String> getAll(By containerLocator) {
505      return getAll(DEFAULT_TYPE, containerLocator);
506   }
507
508   /**
509    * Retrieves the text of all checkboxes inside a container identified by the specified locator, regardless of their
510    * state, using the given checkbox component type.
511    *
512    * @param componentType    The specific checkbox component type.
513    * @param containerLocator The locator for the container that contains the checkboxes.
514    * @return A list of strings representing the text of all checkboxes.
515    */
516   List<String> getAll(CheckboxComponentType componentType, By containerLocator);
517}
